name: Number Guesser
description: Try to guess a random number between 1 and 100.

name: Hangman
description: Classic word guessing game. Try to guess the word before the hangman is complete.

name: Rock Paper Scissors
description: Play the classic Rock Paper Scissors game against the computer.

name: Quiz Game
description: Test your knowledge with this multiple-choice quiz game.

name: Tic Tac Toe
description: Classic Tic Tac Toe game. Play against a friend on the same computer.

name: Math Challenge
description: Test your math skills with increasingly difficult problems.

name: Word Scramble
description: Unscramble letters to form valid words.

name: Blackjack
description: Play the classic card game Blackjack against the dealer.

name: Snake
description: Navigate a snake to collect food and grow without hitting the walls or yourself.

name: Text Adventure
description: Embark on a short text-based adventure with multiple paths and endings.
